title: E74 History of Television
itunes:title: History of Television
description:
In this episode, the team discusses the history of television with historian, media executive, and author of "The Blackface Minstrel Show in Mass Media", Tim Brooks.

Go to TimBrooks.net to purchase his books and to learn more!

Go to JimJefferies.com to buy tickets to Jim's upcoming tour, The Moist Tour.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
